content: I think a 5K route sounds perfect for our team-building event. I actually participated in a 5K charity walk for cancer research recently on October 15th, and it was a great experience. We raised over $2,000 as a team, and I walked with my colleagues from work. It was a fantastic way to bond with them and contribute to a good cause. For our event, I'm thinking of having some snacks and refreshments available at the finish line. Do you have any suggestions for healthy snacks that would be easy to provide and appealing to our team?
